channel.title: My compiler isnt working i get this when i try to compile
channel.description:
'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
someone please help i will make you an admin or mod for my server

Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: My compiler isnt working i get this when i try to compile
item.dc:creator: @M4G3OWNS M4G3OWNS
item.description:
@M4G3OWNS wrote:

ok in ur compiler put

@echo off COLOR 08 title my sever "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin/java.exe" server pause
